channel.title: 美联社

item.title: 最新消息：大谷翔平的翻译水原一平因被指控非法赌博和盗窃日本棒球明星的钱财而被洛杉矶道奇队解雇。

item.title: 四年前的这个月，席卷全球的冠状病毒大流行降临美国。@anthonyted写道，三月的第三周是改变美国的一周。
item.description:
Four years ago this month, the coronavirus pandemic that was sweeping the world descended on the U.S. The third week of March was the week that changed America, @anthonyted wrote.

Read more from his story, originally published in March 2020. https://t.co/eoWfQehP1p

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 纽约保护官员最近扣押了一条鳄鱼，鳄鱼的主人正在为归还鳄鱼而斗争，他说这只被他命名为阿尔伯特的爬行动物与他共同生活了三十多年，是一只温顺的庞然大物，不会对任何人造成危险。
item.description:
The owner of an alligator recently seized by conservation officers in New York is fighting for its return, saying the reptile he named Albert and has shared a home with for more than three decades is a gentle giant that’s no danger to anyone. pic.twitter.com/EMLrcxdZ9Y

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 密西西比州前副警长被判 40 年监禁，法官谴责对两名黑人男子的残暴袭击

item.title: 在美国虾的主要供应国印度，美联社记录了挤在仓库里轮班工作 10 小时的妇女，她们每天只需支付 3 美元，就能剥出成堆的虾。
item.description:
In India, the leading supplier of American shrimp, AP documented women packed into warehouses for 10-hour shifts peeling endless piles of shrimp for as little as $3 a day.

Watchdogs say conditions in the industry constitute labor abuse. https://t.co/lAaPNMMsvA

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

Ramy Youssef shares challenges he's faced when incorporating presidential politics into his comedy. The actor and comedian's latest stand-up special is “Ramy Youssef: More Feelings.” pic.twitter.com/DhLa1NxbBg

item.title: 杰克-吉伦哈尔（Jake Gyllenhaal）谈重拍 1989 年原版电影《路屋》的挑战。在新版中，吉伦哈尔模仿帕特里克-斯维兹（Patrick Swayze）饰演道尔顿（Dalton），一个试图摆脱黑暗过去的前终极格斗锦标赛（UFC）拳手。
item.description:
Jake Gyllenhaal on the challenge of remaking the original 1989 "Road House" film. In the new version, Gyllenhaal channels Patrick Swayze as Dalton, an ex-UFC fighter trying to escape his dark past. pic.twitter.com/645usvoVgs

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 20, 2024

item.title: 康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）说，也许他可以成为电影动作明星。 这位前 UFC 格斗选手将与杰克-吉伦哈尔（Jake Gyllenhaal）共同出演经典邪典电影《公路旅店》的翻拍版。
item.description:
Conor McGregor says maybe he could become a movie action star. The former UFC fighter stars alongside Jake Gyllenhaal in the remake of the classic cult film "Road House." pic.twitter.com/capr37mXkd

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 20, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）周三宣布，他将立即辞去爱尔兰联合政府中右翼政党费恩盖尔党（Fine Gael）党魁一职，并将在党内领导人竞选结束后接替他的总理职务。
item.description:
Irish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar announced Wednesday he is quitting immediately as head of the center-right Fine Gael party, part of Ireland’s coalition government, and will be replaced as prime minister, or taoiseach, after a party leadership contest. pic.twitter.com/FqQwbvcNzV

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 根据 78 亿美元的协议，ESPN 将在 2031 年之前继续作为大学橄榄球季后赛的主办方
item.description:
ESPN will remain the home of the College Football Playoff through 2031 under $7.8 billion deal https://t.co/qBhIqYcA6j

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024
